t: How to Navigate an Amazon Invoice Request
s: October 29, 2024 - Amazon is unlikely to accept Proforma invoices. Proforma invoices don’t prove a transaction was completed and can appear like a quote. If a Proforma invoice is all you have, call your supplier and request an invoice that shows the transaction was completed.
